sentences.en: Forrest was normally mild-mannered, affable, and untalkative.
sentences.cn: 福里斯特通常态度温和、待人亲切、少言寡语。

sentences.en: He had been as instructive as Milton's " affable archangel ".
sentences.cn: 他正如米尔顿那位 “ 亲切的天使长 ” 一样循循善诱.

sentences.en: He is affable to his guests.
He was affable and had no side.
He was affable at one moment, choleric the next.
sentences.cn: 他一会儿还和蔼可亲，可一转眼就火冒三丈。

sentences.en: He was not a great talker, but he was quite a mild, affable sort of man.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢多说话, 但同时,确是个温柔可亲的人物.

sentences.en: How the beautiful silk is affable, genial to everyone.
sentences.cn: 多丽丝对每个人都和蔼可亲.

sentences.en: Mr Brooke is an extremely affable and approachable man.
sentences.cn: 布鲁克先生极为谦和，平易近人。

sentences.en: Murray was an affable, free-spirited man.
sentences.cn: 默里是个温和友善、无拘无束的人。

sentences.en: Pendennis is one of the most affable young men I ever knew.
sentences.cn: 潘登尼斯是我认识的最平易近人的年轻人之一.
突然,凯茨的态度变得几乎是和蔼可亲的样子.

sentences.en: Suddenly, Keefe was less affable, even faintly troubled.
sentences.cn: 基夫的脸色突然变了,不那么亲切了, 甚至有点不安的样子.

words.tran_cn: 殷勤地；友好地；容易亲近地

trans.tran_cn: 友善的，和蔼的，平易近人的，（天气）宜人
trans.tran_en: friendly and easy to talk to
